00029 #ifndef __FileSystem_H__
00030 #define __FileSystem_H__

00034 #include "OgreArchive.h"

00037 namespace Ogre {
00038 
00042     class _OgreExport FileSystemArchive : public Archive 
00043     {
00044     protected:
00055         void findFiles(const String& pattern, bool recursive, bool dirs,
00056             StringVector* simpleList, FileInfoList* detailList);
00057 
00058     public:
00059         FileSystemArchive(const String& name, const String& archType );
00060         ~FileSystemArchive();
00061 
00063         bool isCaseSensitive(void) const;
00064 
00066         void load();
00068         void unload();
00069 
00071         DataStreamPtr open(const String& filename) const;
00072 
00074         StringVectorPtr list(bool recursive = true, bool dirs = false);
00075 
00077         FileInfoListPtr listFileInfo(bool recursive = true, bool dirs = false);
00078 
00080         StringVectorPtr find(const String& pattern, bool recursive = true,
00081             bool dirs = false);
00082 
00084         FileInfoListPtr findFileInfo(const String& pattern, bool recursive = true,
00085             bool dirs = false);
00086 
00088         bool exists(const String& filename);
00089 
00090     };
00091 
00093     class _OgrePrivate FileSystemArchiveFactory : public ArchiveFactory
00094     {
00095     public:
00096         virtual ~FileSystemArchiveFactory() {}
00098         const String& getType(void) const;
00100         Archive *createInstance( const String& name ) 
00101         {
00102             return new FileSystemArchive(name, "FileSystem");
00103         }
00105         void destroyInstance( Archive* arch) { delete arch; }
00106     };
